summary: Kalki is the last avatar of Vishnu, who will come at the end of the world's age, called Kali Yuga. His arrival will bring an end to evil and start a new golden age. He is often shown riding a white horse and carrying a powerful sword. According to Hindu texts, Kalki will save the world and restore peace and justice. His story is also found in other religions like Buddhism and Sikhism, showing the influence of this legendary figure across different cultures.
title: Kalki
